rtega_mnemonic:
諧諧RS
谐谐		harmonize, agree, joke, jest, settle
  • speak 言 in order that everyone 皆 agrees: harmonize or joke or settlement
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 皆 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 皆 [ jiē ] all, every, everybody
heisig_chinese_memo: If a choir is to be harmonious (orderliness), all the voices need to combine in accord to hit the right notes, and say the right words.
heisig_story: The harmoney of "a place for everything and everything in its place" is applied here to the orderliness of all the words one speaks.
koohiiStory1: To have orderliness, your words must be in all the right places.
koohiiStory2: 起立(きりつ)！ Hearing these words, all the students immediately stand at attention. The orderliness of classes in Japan is incredible.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 皆 (みな、カイ все, всё).

Kanshudo_mnemonic: everyone's (皆) words (言) can be a joke
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I'm in accord with your words of laundry advice - get all-temperature detergent and all you need is to separate your colors.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription starts with " words " and " all " sounds. The original meaning is the harmony of speech and vocal music, and it is extended to the harmony and coordination of various relationships. "Shuowen": "Harmony, Xiye. From words, all sounds." Duan Yucai's note: "This is used differently from the sect, and it is exclusively for the harmony." Zhang Shunhui's "Shuowen Jiezi About Annotation": " Jiang Yuan said: "This combination of words is different from those who specialize in music." Shun Hui's press: Although the two characters are used differently, they are passed through to make harmony. The book "Baibu": "All, all words are also. "Therefore, all Congs are all sound characters, and many have the same meaning." "Jade Chapter": "Harmony, harmony."

" Harmony " and " Xie " General, can represent sound, music coordination, the idea was harmony of relationships; and " and ", " and similar relationship" universal. And " and compared", " harmony " focuses on resonance, "the voice and " focuses sing to each other, two-way communication. "Zuo Zhuan. "Eleventh Year of Xianggong": "Like the harmony of music, everything is inharmonious." " Harmony " is extended to emotional harmony, "Book. "Yao Dian": "Father is stubborn, mother is stubborn, elephant is proud, and filial to overcome harmony." It means that Shun's father is stupid, his mother is tyrannical, and his younger brother named Xiang is arrogant and rude, and Shun can even get along with them with filial piety. Bronze inscription means harmony, Cai Houpan: "Kang, Harmony and Good", which means peace, harmony, harmony and friendship. "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Da Zai": "To know the country, to rule all officials, and to harmonize the people." Harmony makes things happen, so " harmony " also has the meaning of doing things well. Qing Li Yu "Feng Qiu Huang. Avoid sex": "If fame is not married, marriage is difficult to be harmonious." It means that marriage is difficult if fame is not established. "Mirror Flower Edge. Chapter 15: "If a teacher takes a student's letter, there is nothing wrong with it." It means that if a teacher takes a student's letter, everything will be done. And "Gray Harmony" is to win the resonance of others from the words, thereby eliminating the gap, "Wen Xin Diao Long. Harmony: "All humorous words are also simple, simple and vulgar, and all are happy to laugh." Jokes often arouse people's laughter and make the atmosphere harmonious, so the jokes that create a harmonious atmosphere are also called " Xie " (see Wang Fengyang).
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription starts with " words " and " all " sounds. The original meaning is the harmony of speech and vocal music, and it is extended to the harmony and coordination of various relationships.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「言」，「皆」聲，本義是言語、聲樂的和諧，引申為各種關係的和合、協調。《說文》：「諧，詥也。从言，皆聲。」段玉裁注：「此與龠部龤異用，龤專謂樂和。」張舜徽《說文解字約注》：「江沅曰：『此蓋謂言語之合，與龤專言樂者不同。』舜徽按：二字雖異用，然經傳通作諧。本書〈白部〉：『皆，俱詞也。』故凡從皆聲字，多有和同義。」《玉篇》：「諧，和也。」

　　「諧」與「龤」通用，皆可表示聲音、樂曲上的協調，引申為各種關係的和合；與「和」、「龢」通用的關係相似。與「和」相比，「諧」重在聲音上的共鳴，「和」重在彼此唱和，雙向交流。《左傳．襄公十一年》：「如樂之和，無所不諧。」「諧」引申為情感上的融洽無間，《書．堯典》：「父頑，母嚚，象傲，克諧以孝。」意謂舜的父親愚妄，母親暴虐，名叫象的弟弟傲慢無禮，舜都能以至孝與他們和睦相處。金文表示和諧，蔡侯盤：「康諧龢好」，意謂安樂和諧，和睦友好。《周禮．天官．大宰》：「以知邦國，以統百官，以諧萬民。」和睦則事成，故「諧」又有辦妥、辦成之意。清李漁《鳳求凰．避色》：「功名未偶，姻事難諧。」意謂功名未立，婚事難成。《鏡花緣．第十五回》：「老師如攜門生信去，此事斷無不諧。」意謂老師如果帶學生的信去，事無不成。而「灰諧」是從言語上博得別人的共鳴，從而消除隔骸，《文心雕龍．諧隱》：「諧之言皆也，辭淺會俗，皆悅笑也。」笑話常引起人們的歡笑，使氣氛和諧，所以造成和諧氣氛的笑談也稱作「諧」（參王鳳陽）。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「言」，「皆」聲，本義是言語、聲樂的和諧，引申為各種關係的和合、協調。

金文從「 言 」，「 皆 」聲，本義是言語、聲樂的和諧，引申為各種關係的和合、協調。《說文》：「諧，詥也。从言，皆聲。」段玉裁注：「此與龠部龤異用，龤專謂樂和。」張舜徽《說文解字約注》：「江沅曰：『此蓋謂言語之合，與龤專言樂者不同。』舜徽按：二字雖異用，然經傳通作諧。本書〈白部〉：『皆，俱詞也。』故凡從皆聲字，多有和同義。」《玉篇》：「諧，和也。」 「 諧 」與「 龤 」通用，皆可表示聲音、樂曲上的協調，引申為各種關係的和合；與「 和 」、「 龢 」通用的關係相似。與「 和 」相比，「 諧 」重在聲音上的共鳴，「 和 」重在彼此唱和，雙向交流。《左傳．襄公十一年》：「如樂之和，無所不諧。」「 諧 」引申為情感上的融洽無間，《書．堯典》：「父頑，母嚚，象傲，克諧以孝。」意謂舜的父親愚妄，母親暴虐，名叫象的弟弟傲慢無禮，舜都能以至孝與他們和睦相處。金文表示和諧，蔡侯盤：「康諧龢好」，意謂安樂和諧，和睦友好。《周禮．天官．大宰》：「以知邦國，以統百官，以諧萬民。」和睦則事成，故「 諧 」又有辦妥、辦成之意。清李漁《鳳求凰．避色》：「功名未偶，姻事難諧。」意謂功名未立，婚事難成。《鏡花緣．第十五回》：「老師如攜門生信去，此事斷無不諧。」意謂老師如果帶學生的信去，事無不成。而「灰諧」是從言語上博得別人的共鳴，從而消除隔骸，《文心雕龍．諧隱》：「諧之言皆也，辭淺會俗，皆悅笑也。」笑話常引起人們的歡笑，使氣氛和諧，所以造成和諧氣氛的笑談也稱作「 諧 」（參王鳳陽）。
Bronze inscription starts with " words" and " all" sounds. The original meaning is the harmony of speech and vocal music, and it is extended to the harmony and coordination of various relationships. "Shuowen": "Harmony, Xiye. From words, all sounds." Duan Yucai's note: "This is used differently from the sect, and it is exclusively for the harmony." Zhang Shunhui's "Shuowen Jiezi About Annotation": " Jiang Yuan said: "This combination of words is different from those who specialize in music." Shun Hui's press: Although the two characters are used differently, they are passed through to make harmony. The book "Baibu": "All, all words are also. "Therefore, all Congs are all sound characters, and many have the same meaning." "Jade Chapter": "Harmony, harmony." " Harmony" and " Xie" General, can represent sound, music coordination, the idea was harmony of relationships; and " and", " and similar relationship" universal. And " and compared", " harmony" focuses on resonance, "the voice and" focuses sing to each other, two-way communication. "Zuo Zhuan. "Eleventh Year of Xianggong": "Like the harmony of music, everything is inharmonious." " Harmony" is extended to emotional harmony, "Book. "Yao Dian": "Father is stubborn, mother is stubborn, elephant is proud, and filial to overcome harmony." It means that Shun's father is stupid, his mother is tyrannical, and his younger brother named Xiang is arrogant and rude, and Shun can even get along with them with filial piety. Bronze inscription means harmony, Cai Houpan: "Kang, Harmony and Good", which means peace, harmony, harmony and friendship. "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Da Zai": "To know the country, to rule all officials, and to harmonize the people." Harmony makes things happen, so " harmony" also has the meaning of doing things well. Qing Li Yu "Feng Qiu Huang. Avoid sex": "If fame is not married, marriage is difficult to be harmonious." It means that marriage is difficult if fame is not established. "Mirror Flower Edge. Chapter 15: "If a teacher takes a student's letter, there is nothing wrong with it." It means that if a teacher takes a student's letter, everything will be done. And "Gray Harmony" is to win the resonance of others from the words, thereby eliminating the gap, "Wen Xin Diao Long. Jokes often arouse people's laughter and make the atmosphere harmonious, so the jokes that create a harmonious atmosphere are also called " Xie" (see Wang Fengyang).

諧字的基本解释

諧
xié
见“谐”。

諧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》户皆切，平皆，匣。］
“谐1”的繁体字。
(1)和合；协调。
(2)办妥；办成。
(3)商议定。参见“諧價”。
(4)辨别。
(5)对照。
(6)诙谐；戏谑。

諧字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1170第11
【唐韻】戸皆切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】雄皆切，?音骸。【說文】詥也。又【廣雅】耦也。【玉篇】合也，調也。【書·堯典】克諧以孝。又【舜典】八音克諧。【左傳·襄十一年】如樂之和，無所不諧。【禮·禮器】君子有禮，則外諧而內無怨。　又【文心雕龍】諧之言皆也，辭淺會俗，皆悅笑也。【前漢·敘傳】東方贍辭，詼諧倡優。【晉書·顧愷之傳】愷之好諧謔，人多愛狎之。　又平論定其價也。【後漢·宦者張讓傳】當之官者，皆先至西園，諧價，然後得去。　又古書名。【莊子·逍遙遊】《齊諧》者，志怪者也。　又鳥名。【博雅】鴆鳥，其雄謂之運日，其雌謂之隂諧。【淮南子·繆稱訓】隂諧知雨。【註】天將隂雨則鳴。　又叶弦雞切，音奚。【後漢·五行志】更始時童謠曰：諧不諧，在赤眉。又【儒林周澤傳】時人爲之語曰：生世不諧，作大常妻。

考證：〔【博雅】鴆鳥，其雄謂之運目，其雌謂之隂諧。〕　謹照原文運目改運日。

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
諧字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] Harmony; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1170 Page 11
[Tang Yun] All cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] All males cut,? Yin Mule. 【Said Wen】Xin Ye. And 【Guang Ya】Coupling. 【Jade articles】Hey, tune. 【Book·Yaodian】To overcome harmony and filial piety. Also 【Shun Dian】Eight sounds to restrain harmony. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year of Xiang] Like a harmony of music, there is nothing in harmony. 【Rite·Ritual Instruments】A gentleman is polite, but he is humorous on the outside but no complaints on the inside.　[Wen Xin Diao Long] The words of humor are all too, the words are shallow and the vulgar, all are happy and laugh. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] Oriental tribute, humorous and advocating excellence. [Book of Jin·The Biography of Gu Kai] Kai Zhi is humorous, and many people love Yi Zhi.　It's fair to determine the price. [The Story of Zhang Rang, the Eunuch in the Later Han Dynasty] All the officials who were officials would go to the Xiyuan first, and then they had to go.　Ancient book title. [Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou] "Qi Xie" is also a stranger.　Also known as the bird name. 【Bo Ya】The rookie, its male is called the day of luck, and its female is called humorous. [Huainanzi·Miao Chengxun] Harmony knows the rain. [Note] The sky will be overcast and rainy.　Ye Xian Ji cut again, Yin Xi. [Later Han·Five Elements] At the beginning, the nursery rhyme said: Harmony and discord, in the red eyebrows. Also [the biography of the scholars of Zhou Ze] The sayings of the time are: life is not in harmony, be a great wife.
